metadata.name: S&P 500 ETF
metadata.entry_guidance: Buy market dips at ≤15% percentile for mean reversion plays
metadata.avoid_guidance: Avoid entering above 75% percentile - limited upside
metadata.special_notes: Tracks broad market, excellent for mean reversion at extreme lows

metadata.name: Nasdaq 100 ETF
metadata.entry_guidance: Buy tech dips at ≤15% percentile, can ride momentum above 50%
metadata.avoid_guidance: Avoid entering above 75% without momentum confirmation
metadata.special_notes: Tech-heavy, higher beta than SPY, good for both mean reversion and momentum

metadata.name: Apple
metadata.entry_guidance: ONLY trade 4H extremes (0-25%), be patient for good setups
metadata.avoid_guidance: NEVER trade 4H 25-95% range (62.5% of time - no statistical edge)
metadata.special_notes: U-shaped curve - mid-range has zero predictive power, median/mean divergence common

metadata.name: Microsoft
metadata.entry_guidance: Can enter almost anywhere 5-75%, target 25-50% for optimal entry
metadata.avoid_guidance: Skip extreme dips 0-5% (small sample) and 85-100% (no edge)
metadata.special_notes: Most reliable stock - works across widest range

metadata.name: NVIDIA
metadata.entry_guidance: Wait for 4H @ 25-50% for best risk/reward or aggressive buying at 0-5%
metadata.avoid_guidance: Don't trade 4H 5-25% (no edge) or 75-100% (trim/exit)
metadata.special_notes: Highest t-score of all stocks at 25-50% sweet spot

metadata.name: Google
metadata.entry_guidance: Wait for 4H @ 5-15% for best bounce, aggressive buying below 25%
metadata.avoid_guidance: NEVER enter when 4H > 75% (zero edge)
metadata.special_notes: Strong mean reversion below 75%, upper range completely fails

metadata.name: Tesla, Inc.
metadata.personality: High Volatility Momentum - Strong trending behavior
metadata.entry_guidance: Enter LONG when momentum is confirmed (percentile > 75). TSLA shows strong trending behavior. Avoid catching falling knives.
metadata.avoid_guidance: Avoid trading in 25-50 range - weak signals. Never fight the trend. Be cautious during earnings.
metadata.special_notes: TSLA is extremely volatile and momentum-driven. Best for trend following strategies. Use wider stops. Works well for 7-14 day momentum plays. High news sensitivity.

metadata.name: Netflix Inc.
metadata.entry_guidance: Enter LONG when percentile > 75 (momentum plays). NFLX shows strong momentum characteristics. Watch for earnings catalysts.
metadata.avoid_guidance: Avoid trading in 0-5, 15-25, 25-50, 95-100 ranges - weak signals. Exercise extreme caution around earnings dates (high volatility).
metadata.special_notes: NFLX is highly volatile (avg daily std > 5%) Strong momentum characteristics - trends can persist Earnings-driven stock with unpredictable reactions to quarterly reports Best for experienced traders comfortable with high volatility Consider position sizing due to large price swings Best 4H trading zones: 5-15, 50-75, 75-85, 85-95

metadata.name: Amazon.com Inc.
metadata.entry_guidance: Buy at ≤15% percentile for mean reversion plays, strong bounce potential
metadata.avoid_guidance: Avoid entering above 75% percentile - limited upside potential
metadata.special_notes: Large cap with strong mean reversion characteristics, excellent liquidity for swing trading

metadata.name: Berkshire Hathaway Inc. Class B
metadata.entry_guidance: Standard entry rules apply
metadata.avoid_guidance: Avoid weak signal zones
metadata.special_notes: Trade based on t-score strength

metadata.name: Broadcom Inc.
metadata.entry_guidance: Standard entry rules apply
metadata.avoid_guidance: Avoid weak signal zones
metadata.special_notes: Trade based on t-score strength

metadata.name: CNX1 (LSE)
metadata.entry_guidance: Treat as an LSE equity; favor 0-15% percentile pullbacks for entries.
metadata.avoid_guidance: Avoid chasing above 85% until the setup resets.
metadata.special_notes: Yahoo Finance symbol CNX1.L (London Stock Exchange).

metadata.name: CBOE Volatility Index
metadata.entry_guidance: Sell volatility at extreme highs (≥85% percentile) for mean reversion. Buy volatility at extreme lows (≤15%) before market events.
metadata.avoid_guidance: Avoid trading mid-range (25-75%) - wait for extremes
metadata.special_notes: VIX measures market fear. Spikes to extreme highs then reverts. Counter-cyclical to equity markets. Best traded at statistical extremes.

metadata.name: IGLS (London)
metadata.entry_guidance: Buy at ≤15% percentile for mean reversion plays. London market hours provide liquidity.
metadata.avoid_guidance: Avoid entering above 75% percentile without strong momentum confirmation
metadata.special_notes: London-based equity. Consider GBP/USD impact on returns. Best traded during London hours (8am-4:30pm GMT).

metadata.name: ExxonMobil
metadata.entry_guidance: Buy extreme dips at ≤5% percentile for strong mean reversion. Energy sector correlation with crude oil.
metadata.avoid_guidance: Avoid entering above 75% percentile - limited upside in extended positions
metadata.special_notes: Strong mean reversion characteristics. Correlates with crude oil prices. Dividend-paying stock with institutional support.

metadata.name: Chevron
metadata.entry_guidance: Buy extreme dips at ≤5% percentile. Similar characteristics to XOM. Watch crude oil correlation.
metadata.avoid_guidance: Avoid entering above 75% percentile - mean reversion weakens at extremes
metadata.special_notes: Integrated energy company with strong balance sheet. Dividend aristocrat. Trades similar to XOM but slightly less volatile.

metadata.name: JPMorgan Chase
metadata.entry_guidance: Buy extreme dips at ≤5% percentile. Sensitive to interest rates and economic data. Watch Fed policy.
metadata.avoid_guidance: Avoid entering above 75% percentile - banking stocks show strong mean reversion
metadata.special_notes: Largest US bank by assets. Sensitive to interest rate environment and economic outlook. Strong institutional ownership.

metadata.name: Bank of America
metadata.entry_guidance: Buy extreme dips at ≤5% percentile. Slightly more volatile than JPM. Interest rate sensitive.
metadata.avoid_guidance: Avoid entering above 75% percentile - strong mean reversion after extremes
metadata.special_notes: Second largest US bank. Higher retail exposure than JPM. More sensitive to consumer credit cycles and Fed policy.

metadata.name: Eli Lilly and Company
metadata.entry_guidance: Standard entry rules apply
metadata.avoid_guidance: Avoid weak signal zones
metadata.special_notes: Trade based on t-score strength

metadata.name: UnitedHealth Group Inc.
metadata.entry_guidance: Standard entry rules apply
metadata.avoid_guidance: Avoid weak signal zones
metadata.special_notes: Trade based on t-score strength

metadata.name: Occidental Petroleum
metadata.entry_guidance: Standard entry rules apply
metadata.avoid_guidance: Avoid weak signal zones
metadata.special_notes: Trade based on t-score strength

metadata.name: Taiwan Semiconductor
metadata.entry_guidance: Standard entry rules apply
metadata.avoid_guidance: Avoid weak signal zones
metadata.special_notes: Trade based on t-score strength

metadata.name: Walmart Inc.
metadata.entry_guidance: Standard entry rules apply
metadata.avoid_guidance: Avoid weak signal zones
metadata.special_notes: Trade based on t-score strength

metadata.name: Costco
metadata.entry_guidance: Buy extreme dips at ≤5% percentile. Strong membership model provides stability. Consumer discretionary sector.
metadata.avoid_guidance: Avoid entering above 75% percentile - mean reversion pattern weakens at extremes
metadata.special_notes: Warehouse retailer with membership model. Strong pricing power. Less volatile than typical retail. Consistent earnings growth.

metadata.name: SPDR Gold Trust
metadata.entry_guidance: Enter LONG when percentile < 25 (oversold). Gold shows mean reversion at extremes.
metadata.avoid_guidance: Avoid trading in 0-25 range at 4H - weak signals. Be cautious in high volatility periods.
metadata.special_notes: Gold is a safe haven asset. Best during market uncertainty. Works well for swing trades (7-14 day holds). Daily shows strong edge across most bins.

metadata.name: iShares Silver Trust
metadata.entry_guidance: Enter LONG when percentile < 25 (oversold). Silver shows stronger mean reversion than gold.
metadata.avoid_guidance: Avoid 0-25 range at 4H - weak/negative signals. Be cautious of high volatility (>5% daily moves).
metadata.special_notes: Silver is more volatile than gold. Strong mean reversion at extremes (0-25%ile on Daily). Best for 7-14 day holds. 95-100 4H zone is strongest.

metadata.name: CSP1 (LSE)
metadata.entry_guidance: S&P 500 tracker on LSE; favor 0-15% percentile pullbacks for entries.
metadata.avoid_guidance: Avoid chasing above 85% until the setup resets.
metadata.special_notes: Yahoo Finance symbol CSP1.L (London Stock Exchange). Tracks S&P 500.

metadata.name: Bitcoin USD
metadata.entry_guidance: Momentum plays at extremes. Buy extreme dips (0-15%) or ride breakouts (85-100%).
metadata.avoid_guidance: Avoid mid-range (30-70%) - choppy price action with no edge.
metadata.special_notes: 24/7 trading. High volatility. Momentum-driven. Yahoo symbol BTC-USD.

metadata.name: E-mini S&P 500 Futures
metadata.entry_guidance: Buy dips at ≤15% percentile. Futures track SPY closely with leverage. Good for mean reversion.
metadata.avoid_guidance: Avoid entering above 75% - mean reversion weakens at highs.
metadata.special_notes: E-mini S&P 500 futures (ES=F). Nearly 24/5 trading. High liquidity. Tracks SPY.

metadata.name: E-mini Nasdaq 100 Futures
metadata.entry_guidance: Buy dips at ≤15% percentile. More volatile than ES. Can ride momentum above 50%.
metadata.avoid_guidance: Avoid entering above 85% without strong momentum confirmation.
metadata.special_notes: E-mini Nasdaq 100 futures (NQ=F). Nearly 24/5 trading. Tech-heavy, higher beta than ES.
